name: digestive chamber,
description:
This is 'digestive chamber,', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
Found in a bonus level on the game's website, these traditional herb-based medicines are used by many of humanity's inhabitants to help them digest food and keep their muscles fresh and strong. Perhaps not surprisingly, the player gets to choose the intended action of the herb: There are a range of effects for users: Natural cure for worms Carrying case for organic soil For a character within the game's level, a 'Potion of Natural Cure will show up at your disposal. It is a gemstone that gives you a 4% chance to cure a disease. If you take it, you will become immune to damage. If you reveal a disease to a person, your target will also be immune to it. Sober and tasty It sounds far-fetched – but unlike many other genre-bending westerns, some of the qualities of the herb are caused by natural occurrences. In a Sierra gamified title called 'Sloot', the player is given the goal of collecting a variety of animals, plants and other plant material on which to grow tree sap. By chucking things at the slugs, the slugs will grow into beautiful and nutritious trees. The slugs also grow very quickly.
